Name: Centre
Description: Central region of Cameroon, home to the political capital, Yaounde.

Name: Littoral
Description: Coastal region, home to the economic capital, Douala, a key port city.

Name: West
Description: A region known for its highlands, including the famous Mount Cameroon.

Name: North West
Description: A region characterized by its mountainous terrain and vibrant ethnic groups.

Name: South West
Description: Known for its tropical forests, beaches, and Mount Cameroon.

Name: Adamawa
Description: Central highland region known for its ethnic diversity and rich culture.

Name: East
Description: A largely forested region, known for its wildlife and natural resources.

Name: North
Description: The northernmost region, known for its desert-like landscapes and ethnic groups.
